Draft Rating:

C+

Monte McNair ranks in the 53th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. McNair's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 2 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:

  • Drafted Jahmi'us Ramsey with 43th pick but was worth 24th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Davion Mitchell with 9th pick but was worth 55th pick.
  • Drafted Keegan Murray with 4th pick but was worth 21th pick.
